getDenominator().details: This is the denominator used for calculating fees

returns._0: The address of the fee recipient

getMembershipBps().details: This is the basis points that will be charged for a membership

getMembershipDuration().details: This is the duration of a membership in seconds

getMembershipFee().details: This is the flat fee that will be charged for a membership

getMembershipMinPrice().details: This is the minimum price that can be set for a membership

returns._0: The minimum price for a membership

getMembershipMintLimit().details: This is the maximum number of free memberships that can be minted per space

params.minPrice: The minimum price for a membership

setMembershipMinPrice(uint256).notice: Set the minimum price for a membership
